attributes.action: create more awareness and urge people to sign up to the Donor register.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I urge the goverment to develop a more high profile campaign to recruit more donor card carriers for 2012. Not only does a transplant save lives, but is also a far cheaper form of treatment than dialysis, potentially saving millions of pounds for the NHS. A high profile campaign will also offer hope to individuals and families around the UK who are in desperate need of a transplant.
